Getting started UI Components API Doc

Source: ui/js/events.js

    /**
     * Tab key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeytab = 'tab';

    /**
     * Enter key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeyenter = 'enter';

    /**
     * Esc key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeyesc = 'esc';

    /**
     * Left arrow key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeyleftarrow = 'left_arrow';

    /**
     * Up arrow key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeyuparrow = 'up_arrow';

    /**
     * Rigth arrow key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeyrightarrow = 'right_arrow';

    /**
     * Down arrow key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeydownarrow = 'down_arrow';

    /**
     * Backspace key event.
     * @constant
     * @memberof ch
     * @type {String}
     */
    ch.onkeybackspace = 'backspace';
